name: Eventlog Cleared
description: One of the Windows Eventlogs has been cleared. e.g. caused by "wevtutil cl" command execution
false_positives: Rollout of log collection agents (the setup routine often includes a reset of the local Eventlog)
System provisioning (system reset before the golden image creation)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND event.code:104 AND winlog.provider_name:Microsoft\-Windows\-Eventlog)`
